NFOfix:

  We missed a protection check in the game, which causes the game to stop
  functioning properly after playing for some time. You either need to 
  (re)install the game and use our new serial (see below), or modify the 
  windows registry as follows.

  For 64bit Windows:
  ------------------
  Modify

  HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Bohemia Interactive Studio\
  Take On Helicopters\KEY 

  to the following value:
  87 0C 3E 49 BF 21 06 31 8C 62 29 4A 52 90 C2

  For other Windows versions:
  ---------------------------
  Modify

  HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Bohemia Interactive Studio\Take On Helicopters\KEY

  to the following value:
  87 0C 3E 49 BF 21 06 31 8C 62 29 4A 52 90 C2

Installation:
  1. Install the game. 
  2. When asked for a serial use:
     ZDJW-36WG2-33333-44264-55555
  3. Play the game.

You know, I've been messing around with this game a little bit and at first I was thinking that this is junk.  The way it played and looked just sucked compared to FSX and some good add ons.  So then I started messing with the settings and found that I didn't have to turn everything up.  When I selected normal for everything the game feels and looks pretty good.  I'm on a hex core 3.8ghz GTX560ti 8GB ram.  Whenever I turned graphics up higher it would start to lag. but now it is pretty smooth
